long_description: With a comfy, flattering shape and a stretchy knit blend, the Horny Toad Rosalinda Dress is your new fave for nights on the town and days at play. Organic cotton/Tencel(R) blend has a touch of spandex for easy stretch. Organic cotton is breathable and easy care, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Double-layer empire bodice has horizontal bust pleats for fit. 3/4-length sleeves make the dress a good match for mild weather in any season. Horny Toad Rosalinda Dress features a deep V-neck and a knee-length, A-line silhouette. Closeout.
short_description: With a comfy, flattering shape and a stretchy knit blend, the Horny Toad Rosalinda Dress is your new fave for nights on the town and days at play.
